APP.AlertLabelHint: A short label to identify this alert in the Combat Alerts window
APP.ChatMessagePlaceholder: The chat message to display when the alert is triggered. Leave blank for no message.
APP.MacroHint: The id or name of the macro to run on trigger.
APP.MacroInvalid: The macro id or name does not match any world macros.
APP.TriggerAtTopOfRoundNum: Triggers at the top of round {num}
APP.TriggerAtStartOfTurnNum: Triggers at the start of the turn in round {num}
APP.TriggerAtEndOfTurnNum: Triggers at the end of the turn in round {num}
APP.TriggerOnTopOfRound: This alert will trigger at the top of the round.
APP.TriggerOnTurn: This alert will trigger on the following turn:
APP.ValidRoundWarning: Warning: the trigger for this alert has already occurred!
APP.WhisperToHint: The above chat message will only be sent to the following selected users. If none are selected, it will default to a public message. Hold CTRL or CMD to select multiple users.

CannotCreateAlert.NoCombatants: Cannot create an alert on the current turn; the active combat has no combatants.
CannotCreateAlert.NoCombats: Cannot create a turn alert if no combats exist.

CannotShowAlertConfig.NoCombatId: Either no combat id was provided or the id provided did not match any active combats.

CannotViewCombatAlert.NoCombat: Cannot view alerts for combat because no combat id was provided and there is no currently active combat!
